column1: I'm... not comfortable with children. But since a captain is supposed to project an image of geniality, you're to see that's what I project. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
A code of honor protects one, captain, like a magic cloak. - Lutan
Oh, your species is always suffering and dying. - Q
If winning is not important, then commander, why keep score? - Worf
Thinking about what you can't control only wastes energy, and creates its own enemy. - Worf
Only fools have no fear. - Worf
Expect the unexpected. - Chang
I failed, sir. I failed you, and I failed the Enterprise. I'm sorry. "Nonsense! Did you do your best?" "Yes." - Wesley Crusher and Captain Jean-Luc Picard
The true test of a warrior is not without, it is within. - Worf
Where are the words: duty, honor, loyalty, without which a warrior is nothing? - Worf

History has proved again and again that whenever mankind interferes with a less developed civilization, no matter how well intentioned that interference may be, the results are invariably disastrous. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
A great poet once said All spirits are enslaved that serve things evil.'" - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Friendship must dare to risk, Counselor, or it isn't friendship. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
The challenge, Mr. Offenhouse, is to improve yourself... to enrich yourself. Enjoy it. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Captain, the most elementary and valuable statement in science, the beginning of wisdom, is 'I do not know.' - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Confidence is faith in oneself. It can't be easily given by another. - Deanna Troi
Your Honor, a courtroom is a crucible; in it we burn away irrelevancies until we are left with a pure product: the truth, for all time.  - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
You choose your enemies, you choose your friends; but family? That's in the stars. - Miles O'Brien
I've noted that some people use humor as a shield. They talk much, yet say little. - Worf
It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. That is not a weakness, that is life. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
If you drop a hammer on your foot, it's hardly useful to get mad at the hammer. - William T. Riker
Deanna, facing death is the ultimate test of character. I don't want to die but if I have to do, I'd like to do it with a little pride. - William T. Riker
You will never come up against a greater adversary than your own potential... - Paul Stubbs
Data, telling us you're going to fail before you make the attempt is never wise. - Beverly Crusher
This is just a thing... and things can be replaced. Lives cannot. - Data
Are you sure this is what he wants? That's the problem with believing in a supreme being: trying to determine what he wants.  - Deanna Troi
Anticipation is fun. - Deanna Troi
One world's butcher is another world's hero. Perhaps I am neither one." - Jarok
Prime Minister, even the most comfortable prison is still a prison. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
'A matter of internal security' – the age-old cry of the oppressor. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
History has shown us that strength may be useless when faced with terrorism. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
The more difficult the task, the sweeter the victory. - William T. Riker
Through joining, they have been healed. Grief has been transmuted to joy. Loneliness to belonging. - Data
Brothers forgive. - Dr. Beverly Crusher
n all trust there is the possibility of betrayal...Without trust there's no friendship. No closeness. None of the emotional bonds that make us who we are." - William T. Riker
Death is a normal part of life. Maybe some of us are better at facing that than others. - Janet Brooks
Therapists are always the worst patients. Except for doctors, of course. - Dr. Beverly Crusher
Some days you get the bear, and some days the bear gets you. - William T. Riker
She's probably done the most horrific thing one person can do to another: not live up to your expectations. - Guinan
To admit that you're afraid gives you strength. - Deanna Troi
I've been told that patience is sometimes a more effective weapon than the sword. - Worf
We cannot regain our honor by acting dishonorably! - Worf
In my experience, communication is a matter of patience, imagination. I would like to believe that these are qualities that we have in sufficient measure. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Chocolate is a serious thing. - Deanna Troi
Genetic manipulation or not, nobody's perfect. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
You made a mistake. There isn't a man among us who hasn't been young enough to make one. - Boothby
It is interesting that people try to find meaningful patterns in things that are essentially random. - Data
I always believed that I didn't need children to complete my life. Now, I couldn't imagine life without them. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
No one is more qualified to write your story than you are. - Samuel Clement
Just 'cause something's old doesn't mean you throw it away. - Geordi LaForge
When children learn to devalue others they can devalue anyone, including their parents. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Torture has never been a reliable means of extracting information; it is ultimately self-defeating as a means of gaining control - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
I think, therefore I am! - Moriarty
People blame the military for the wars we are asked to fight. - Toreth
If you want to get ahead, you have to take chances... stand out the crowd, get noticed! - William T. Riker
There are many parts of my youth that I'm not proud of...But when I pulled on one of those threads... it unraveled the tapestry of my life. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
The wind does not respect a fool. Do not stand before the wind, Gowron. - Kahless
All the quantum fluctuations in the universe will not change the cards in your hand. - Albert Einstein
It may turn out that the moral thing to do was not the right thing to do. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Dreams are the royal road to the knowledge of the mind. - Deanna Troi
There is a way out of every box, a solution to every puzzle; it's just a matter of finding it. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
It is part of our job to retain an open mind. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
I've worked hard here. My record is exemplary. If you're going to judge me, judge me for what I am now. - Sito Jaxa
Have faith in their abilities to solve their problems on their own. - The Traveler
So if you're sacred... then you have to treat yourself with respect... to do otherwise is to desecrate something holy. - Lakanta
